description: I am a wine professional based in Toronto. I really enjoy sharing wine with new and old friends - especially those who haven't had the chance to try the amazing caliber of wines we are producing here. Canada is exploding in terms of quality and producers - it's an exciting time to be here.

reviews.title: Amazing host and not your typical wine tasting event
text: Laura was an amazing host and took the time to make this experience both intimate and informative. We definitely enjoyed chatting with her and learning more about Canadian wine history as well as sampling some excellent wines. Thanks again Laura. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Highly recommend!
text: I highly recommend! We discovered and learned so much about Canadian wines, exactly what we were looking for. The ambiance was very cosy and friendly, and the food platter really good!

reviews.title: Intimate Wine Tasting
text: This wine tasting took us on a journey, tasting different wines from all around Canada. We were extremely impressed with Laura's knowledge and expertise. The room where the tasting took place was very intimate and cozy, which paired nicely with the food/wine. We had the pleasure of meeting 4 other attendees who we chatted with until the very end. It was a great addition to our evening and will definitely do this tasting again in the future. Laura is a superstar!

reviews.title: Perfect Wine Tasting Experience!
text: Laura's wine tasting event was a delightful experience, showcasing her meticulous curation and passion for the world of wine. The thoughtfully selected wines, paired with artisanal cheeses and gourmet bites, created a sophisticated and well-rounded tasting. Laura's engaging presentation, coupled with her insights into the winemaking process, elevated the evening beyond a typical tasting, offering a memorable and educational journey through the vineyards. I highly recommend Laura's events to anyone seeking a refined and enriching wine experience.

reviews.title: Wonderful Wedding Gift
text: We were delighted to break bread with an interesting group of people and a fabulous (and knowledgeable) host while sipping Canadian wines smartly curated for their unique farming methods, innovative business concept and superior flavour.  What a clever wedding gift we were given!

reviews.title: Great idea for Toronto visit
text: Had a great time with Laura.  It was awesome to explore more about a wine region we really had no knowledge of.  The snacks were great, too.  Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Private wine tasting delight in Toronto.
text: An exceptional tasting of wines that shone a light on what Canada is capable of producing.  If this is the mission, Laura is professionally and passionately delivering the assignment.

reviews.title: Delightful tasting
text: Such a fun and educational experience. I hadn’t tasted many Canadian wines before this tasting and was definitely impressed!

If you are looking for a standard, traditional tasting with chards and Pinots, this might not be the experience for you. But if you’re looking to try something new and different, and learn a lot along the way, I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Such a fun way to taste wine!
text: This was so much fun! Went for a girls trip and the wine tasting was the highlight of our entire weekend! If you enjoy great wine, food and good company, this is the event for you.

reviews.title: We will be back!
text: We had such a great time - Laura brings people together in the most down to earth way, making everyone feel at ease, while also pouring amazing wines and sharing all her impeccable knowledge. We will be back!

reviews.title: One of a kind experience
text: This was one of the best events I’ve been to this year. Amazing host who’s very knowledgeable about wines. Me and my finance also got to meet new friends. I can’t wait to go again.
This was the highlight of our trip!
It feels very insider/behind the scenes with tons of amazing wines that go along with it.
It's also such a great way to meet other people!
10/10 experience

reviews.title: Thoughtful passionate tour of Canadian wine!
text: Laura has a deep reservoir of wine contacts. When I was setting up the tasting, I mentioned that I had drank a fair amount of ON wine (listing off a number of wineries that I had had previously). She brough a ton of interesting stuff (ON, BC, QC, NS) that I had never seen or tasted before, considering what I had told her that I liked. Just awesome to have a learning experience with a balance of humour and serious wine chops

reviews.title: Unexpected private wine tasting experience!
text: Booked this for our wedding anniversary and got a private wine tasting with Laura! She is definitely a knowledgeable wine connoisseur and we both learned a lot about wine that night!!

reviews.title: Wholesome witty wine experience
text: Laura led my friends and I through an oenophilic tour of Canada right from her classy-chic secretive studio. Her unpretentious approach to wine as an expert and relentlessly witty humour as a host left us all wanting to hear more, and to drink more Canadiana. Thanks Laura!!

reviews.title: Such a special gem of an experience!
text: OMG this is the most underrated experience that exists currently in Toronto!
Laura has an amazing, secret location you would NEVER find wandering around.
If you think Canadian wine is subpar, please book with Laura - she will show you a whole host of wines you never knew existed that will surprise and delight you.
Laura also showcases tons of amazing local artisans from chilli garlic oil to pickles - all made by local, female entrepreneurs.
Cannot recommend this enough!

reviews.title: THE Great Canadian Wine Tasting!
text: I really enjoyed my experience with Laura. I was looking for an experience to learn and taste unique wines, as Ontario is awful with it's limited selection at the LCBO. Having the opportunity to taste wines from across various provinces curated for me, was great. Made me realize what I'm missing...
Laura is a kind and gracious host, with a huge knowledge of Canadian wines. Laura is fighting to make wine approachable, and helping smaller producers share the love of wine with the rest of us!
Awesome experience; would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Such a unique and amazing experience!
text: We had an amazing time with Laura - it's truly such a unique experience she has curated.
It's tucked away in a super cool location, revealed only to you upon booking the experience.
The wines she pours are none you'd ever find on your own - they're all boutique, tiny production wineries showcasing how special and interesting Canadian wines are.
Laura is warm, welcoming, down to earth and makes this experience well worth it!

reviews.title: Canadian Wine Adventure
text: What a great night! The space is divine and the wine was a treat. I’ve never been to a wine tasting quite like this one. I felt like I was sitting with a very knowledgeable friend as we tasted our way across Canada. The wines we were able to sample were exclusively Canadian and noteworthy. Laura’s extensive knowledge combined with welcoming vibes made for a stellar night. Honestly can’t wait to go back.

reviews.title: Great evening
text: Was a great evening.  She was incredibly knowledgeable.  And shred even valuable information to me for a future trip.   I gained an appreciation for Canadian wines, and look forward to keeping in touch!

reviews.title: A must do activity when visiting Toronto !
text: I had such an amazing time meeting Laura and the other guests. I could have stayed and chatted all night. A must do activity when visiting Toronto !

reviews.title: Definitely recommend! Fun birthday experience
text: Went for my birthday with a couple of friends, and I would definitely recommend! Laura was sweet, funny and personable! Really had a lovely time and would do it again! 5 stars for sure

reviews.title: Well worth with the wait
text: Elevated yet approachable for anyone seeking to nurture a love of wine without the fluff. Laura is a Toronto gem.

reviews.title: Supremely lovely
text: Simply lovely. Laura’s cozy, tucked away studio is a real gem adrift a sea of chaos in Toronto. The wines are unique, the food paired perfectly, and the opportunity to meet others from all over the world was really special.

reviews.title: Who knew…?!
text: ….that Canadian wine is sexy!

Laura’s unconventional and refreshing approach to her tastings makes a lay person like myself feel welcome and relaxed! Once you step into her space,  There is no judgment. You can tell that every detail has been thoughtfully curated from the charcuterie board, to the lighting and candles. By the end of the tasting, don’t be surprised if your thoughts of: “I don’t like white wine” or “I don’t drink Chardonnay” have been debunked and you walk away with two bottles of said wine…and maybe a new friend or two.

reviews.title: Amazing wine with amazing people
text: Laura is an absolute gem - super knowledgeable about wine, and comes with some of the best bottles both at her tastings and boxes available for purchase. She is warm, inviting, not-pretentious, and is genuinely excited when YOU get excited about the wine. Attending one of her dinners is like going to a dinner amongst your best friends who you simply haven't met yet.
Overall - a very unique experience in Toronto, but probably my favourite. I love how she made wine approachable and fun, vs. some stuffy thing.

reviews.title: Wine Maestro Milnes - The Best
text: Laura is prolific.  She bears a considerable tome of wine wisdom gracefully and with an unassuming and genuine charm.  It is always a blast to sit a talk wine with her, I would reccomend it to anyone.  Book with Crushable!!!

reviews.title: Excellent wine tasting class!
text: Laura was excellent! She took her time to explain all of the wines to us, but didn’t make us feel like novice wine drinkers. She had great snacks and great conversation. Also, the location was a fun vibe. I would highly recommend for groups and/or couples.
